admin/app.title: {{appTitle}}
admin/app.config.title: Settings
admin/app.affiliateId.title: Affiliate ID
admin/app.affiliateId.tooltip: ID (3 consonants) that'll represent your connection with this marketplace. Needs to be unique in your account.
admin/app.salesChannel.title: Sales Channel
admin/app.allow-franchise.title: Allow Franchise Accounts
admin/app.salesChannel.tooltip: Catalog that will be sent to the marketplace.
admin/app.notificationEndpoint.title: Notification endpoint
admin/app.integrationStatus.title: Integration status
admin/app.email.tooltip: Email that will receive a VTEX system notification when something happens to this affiliate.
admin/app.error.affiliate.registerFail: Something went wrong when registering the affiliate.
admin/app.error.affiliate.alreadyRegiste: The selected affiliate id already exists. Change the affiliate id or delete the one registered and try again.
admin/app.error.affiliate.invalidFormat: Affiliate with invalid format. It needs to be 3 consonants.
admin/app.error.salesChannel.invalidForm: Sales channel with invalid format. It needs to be an integer number.
admin/app.error.salesChannel.creation: It was not possible to create a sales channel with the data provided.
admin/app.error.salesChannel.missingRequ: Country, culture information, currency and time zone are required fields to create a sales channel for this marketplace.
admin/app.mapper.title: Category mapping
admin/app.sentoffers.error: Something went wrong when consuming Sent Offers API.
admin/app.country.title: Country
admin/app.timezone.title: Time zone
admin/app.cultureInfo.title: Culture information
admin/app.currency.title: Currency
admin/app.country.tooltip: Country that will be used to create the sales channel for this marketplace.
admin/app.timezone.tooltip: Time zone that will be used to create the sales channel for this marketplace.
admin/app.cultureInfo.tooltip: Culture info that will be used to create the sales channel for this marketplace.
admin/app.currency.tooltip: Currency that will be used to create the sales channel for this marketplace.
